public static class opencv_ml.LogisticRegression

    \sa \ref ml_intro_lr

      • predict

        public float predict(@ByVal
            opencv_core.Mat samples,
            @ByVal(nullValue="cv::OutputArray(cv::noArray())")
            opencv_core.Mat results,
            int flags)
        \brief Predicts responses for input samples and returns a float type.

        Overrides:
        predict in class opencv_ml.StatModel
        Parameters:
        samples - The input data for the prediction algorithm. Matrix [m x n], where each row contains variables (features) of one object being classified. Should have data type CV_32F.
        results - Predicted labels as a column matrix of type CV_32S.
        flags - Not used.

      • get_learnt_thetas

        @ByVal
public opencv_core.Mat get_learnt_thetas()
        \brief This function returns the trained paramters arranged across rows.

        For a two class classifcation problem, it returns a row matrix. It returns learnt paramters of the Logistic Regression as a matrix of type CV_32F.

      • create

        @opencv_core.Ptr
public static opencv_ml.LogisticRegression create()
        \brief Creates empty model.

        Creates Logistic Regression model with parameters given.
